CustomProperties.Name: Active
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to set if this step is active

CustomProperties.Name: DisplayMode
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to set the display mode

CustomProperties.Name: PrimaryOrange
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to toggle the primary color.

Rules.InvariantScript: If('Step ID'.Inverse = false, If('Step ID'.PrimaryOrange = true, ColorValue("#D04A02"), ColorValue("#415385")), Color.White)
If('Step ID'.Inverse = false, If('Step ID'.PrimaryOrange = true, ColorValue("#D04A02"), ColorValue("#415385")), Color.White)
If('Step ID'.Inverse = false, If('Step ID'.PrimaryOrange = true, ColorValue("#D04A02"), ColorValue("#415385")), Color.White)
If('Step ID'.Active = true, If('Step ID'.PrimaryOrange = true, ColorValue("#D04A02"), ColorValue("#415385")), ColorValue("#2D2D2D"))
